template_data.title: Broadcryers of Waterdeep IV: Know Thy Sources, Part Two
template_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]

document_data.caption2: Seawind Alley's depiction on maps of different eras
document_data.name: Street of Lances
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Lances''' was a street in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: The road was located at the very north of the ward just south of the [[Trolltower]], running west to east from [[Westwall Street]] to [[Trollkill Street]]. Along the way it passed through the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] and [[Morningstar Way]]. This street also acted as the northern terminus of [[Stormstar's Ride]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The street was walked by [[broadcryer]]s who peddled their [[broadsheet]]s to passers-by.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.wizards.com/default.asp?x=dnd/rl/20031015a|title=Broadcryers of Waterdeep IV: Know Thy Sources, Part Two|accessdate=2008-03-13|author=[[Ed Greenwood]]|date=2003-10-15|work=Realmslore|publisher=[[Wizards of the Coast]]}}
